Stay on top of your transactions with the Payment Notification extension! This tool provides real-time alerts for all your payment activities, ensuring you never miss a transaction. Whether you’re a business owner, freelancer, or just someone who likes to keep track of their finances, this extension is designed to make your life easier.

Features:

Instant notifications for every payment received or sent.
Detailed transaction history with easy-to-read summaries.
Customizable alert settings to suit your preferences.
Secure and private, with no data sharing.
Why Choose Payment Notification?

Real-Time Updates: Get notified the moment a transaction occurs.
User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive design for easy navigation.
Customizable Alerts: Tailor notifications to your needs, whether it’s for large transactions or specific payment methods.
Enhanced Security: Your financial data is protected with top-notch security measures.
Download the Payment Notification extension today and take control of your financial transactions with ease!
